entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:17 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: NNE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
